decisions.what: Delay VMS Multi Box Discounts PR merge until Monday due to high risk on critical business flow
decisions.context: PR impacts critical Good Chop business flow and weekends are high traffic time; team cannot afford incidents during weekend

decisions.what: Break down large VMS PR into smaller PRs for easier review
decisions.context: Original PR too large (~340 lines of code changes) with multiple concerns mixed together, making review difficult

decisions.what: Defer trial box PCS v1/v2 issue fix to later time
decisions.context: Trial box users shouldn't be calling PCS v1 or v2 at all; creating ticket GOC-3025 to address separately

decisions.what: Plan checkout error bug fix for next sprint
decisions.context: Bug affecting ~60 unique customers weekly since July 8th, but not urgent enough to drop current tickets

blockers.description: VMS Multi Box Discounts PR (#56214) blocked from merging until Monday
blockers.impact: VMS Multi Box Discounts implementation delayed; needs to be broken into smaller PRs and GTM tracking issues fixed
Was blocking PR merges; resolved with PR #55712

blockers.description: PCS v2 failure with trial box meal selections
blockers.impact: Issue replicated, working on fix; affects trial box users with mismatched SKUs

blockers.description: Checkout page errors since July 8th affecting users from reset-password flow
blockers.impact: 335 unique users affected (~60 weekly), broken summary or entire page; planned for next sprint

action_items.task: Break down VMS PR #56214 into smaller PRs with separate tracking changes
Fix GTM tracking issues: DiscountComm_ModalDisplay firing incorrectly, DiscountComm_BannerDisplay firing multiple times
Review post-mortem for React Error Boundary Spike on Goodchop Plans Page
Create ticket for checkout error bug affecting reset-password users
Work on fix for PCS v2 trial box issue
Check MR reactivation e2e tests after rebasing with master
Check with Yury about cadence change email communications for Factor Form

key_context.summary: PCS v2 failing when trial box meal selections are submitted with normal box SKU. Issue replicated and being fixed, but broader problem exists where trial box users shouldn't call PCS v1/v2 at all.
key_context.relevance: Affects checkout flow integrity and customer experience; separate ticket GOC-3025 created for systemic fix

key_context.summary: VMS team refactoring GoodChop's DiscountInlineBanner component to remove redux dependencies for cross-brand usage with Factor. Large PR (~340 lines) with GTM tracking issues needs to be broken down.
key_context.relevance: Critical business flow for GoodChop that cannot risk incidents during high-traffic weekend; demonstrates cross-squad collaboration and code reuse

key_context.summary: Since July 8th, ~60 unique customers weekly experiencing errors on checkout page after resetting password, ranging from broken summary to entire broken page. Introduced in PR #54504.
key_context.relevance: Impacts customer acquisition and revenue; affects users who created accounts but didn't complete checkout and are returning

key_context.summary: Factor Form learning from GoodChop's delivery cadence implementation for active customers. GoodChop doesn't send dedicated cadence change emails but references it in reschedule emails and order confirmation T&Cs.
key_context.relevance: Shows knowledge sharing between brands and consistent customer experience patterns across HelloFresh products

key_context.summary: Team enforcing standards for manageable PR sizes to ensure thorough review and reduce risk, especially for critical business flows. Weekend merges avoided for high-risk changes.
key_context.relevance: Demonstrates engineering discipline and risk management practices to maintain system stability during high-traffic periods

summary: GoodChop squad handling multiple issues including PCS v2 trial box failures, checkout errors affecting ~60 weekly users, and coordinating with VMS on Multi Box Discounts refactoring that was blocked until Monday due to risk concerns and PR size.
